SA19n1289:6: pramāṇanirūpaṇapradhānaṃ prakaraṇamārabhamāṇaḥ prathamamāripsitasya prakaraṇasyābhidheyaprayojanaṃ darśayannavatārayati prakaraṇam -- ihetyādinā pramāṇaṃ nirṇetavyamityantena |
SA19n1289:7: svarūpato lakṣaṇataḥ phalaśca pramāṇanirṇayaḥ prakaraṇasyāsya sākṣātprayojanamiti gamyate |
SA19n1289:11: pramāṇapathaṃ nirṇīya pravarttamānānāṃ puruṣārthasiddhiriti paramaṃ prayojanaṃ 'sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusaradbhi' rityanena gamyate,
SA19n1289:16: prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo'pi ye punaraptakāmā akāmā vā na teṣāṃ pramāṇāpekṣā |
SA19n1289:17: ye tu prekṣāparāyaṇā arthinaste puruṣārthasiddhaye pramāṇamanusareyureva |
SA19n1289:21: athāpi prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇādhīneti prameyanirṇayataḥ prāk pramāṇasvarūpaṃ nirṇetavyam,
SA19n1289:23: etena prameyasvarūpanirūpaṇaparānnibandhāt pramāṇasvarūpanirūpaṇaparasyāsya nibandhasya prādhānyaṃ gamyate |
SA19n1289:31: saṃśayaviparyayayoravisaṃvādakatā nāstītyetadupapādayannavisaṃvādakatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe -- gocare tu tatsthāne ghaṭādau satīti |
SA19n1289:34: jalādipratyakṣaṃ jalāya pravarttayat puruṣaṃ jalaṃ prāpayati |
SA19n1289:35: marīcikājalaṃbhramastu jalāya pravarttayat puruṣaṃ jalaṃ na prāpayati |
SA19n1289:42: devadatto yajñadattaṃ karmasu pravarttayan dhanaṃ prāpayati |
SA19n1289:52: yena nirṇayena pravṛttaḥ puruṣo'sati pratibandhe pradarśitamarthaṃ prāpnuyādeveti |
SA19n1289:54: na hi puruṣa iva haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam ' iti,
SA19n1289:56: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ -- avisaṃvāditvaṃ cārthakriyāsamarthāryaprāpaṇaśaktikatvaṃ na tvaryaprāpaṇameva' iti ( tattvasaṃgrahapañjikā pa. 312).
SA19n1289:60: āha ca kamalaśīlastatvasaṃgrahapañcikāyām ' pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamapi sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttamanalādikamarthaṃ tadākāranirbhāsotpattitaḥ paricchindadutpadyate tacca niyatarūpavastugrāhitvādvijātīyavyāvṛttavastvākārānugatattvācca tatraiva vastuni vidhipratiṣedhāvāvirbhāvayati ' analo'yaṃ nāsau kusumastabakādiriti' iti ( tattva. pa. pa. 390)
SA19n1289:61: āha ca tatraivānupadam -- ' jñānaṃ hi viṣayākāramutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindadiva savyāpāramiva bhavati' ayamevārthaprāpaṇavyāpāro jñānasyeti |
SA19n1289:64: na cārthadeśaṃ puruṣamupasarpayadarthaṃ vā puruṣadeśamānayat prāpakaṃ bhavati,
SA19n1289:66: taṃ ca puruṣaṃ na hastena gṛhītvā pravarttayati, kiṃ tarhi ?
SA19n1289:72: kvacitpravṛttyabhāvaḥ kvacitpravṛttāvapyarthālābhaḥ svasvasāmagryabhāvaprayukta iti pramāṇasya prāmāṇyamakṣatamevetyetadupapādayati -- puruṣastviti |
SA19n1289:75: pravṛttāvapi tadalābhaḥ pratibandhāditi phalaphalibhāve bhedādalābhādapravṛttervā pramāṇasya prāmāṇyaṃ na pratirudhyata iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:80: ayamāśayaḥ-purataḥ sannihitamavalokayataḥ sapadi bhavati pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanārahitaṃ nirvikalpakamanirdhāraṇātmakam,
SA19n1289:82: tat jātamātre pratyekṣe yatprāmāṇyasmavisaṃvādakatvamarthaprāpaṇayogyatvaṃ tadarthakriyāprāptimantareṇa na vijñāyate,
SA19n1289:90: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ-yo mandabuddhiḥ jātamātre jalapratyakṣe na tasya prāmāṇyamavadhārayituṃ śaknoti;
SA19n1289:93: amandabuddhistu prakāśavaśadyena idamidameveti sapadyavadhārayati avadharayati ca sapadi prāmāṇyamiti |
SA19n1289:96: śrāvaṇe tu pratyakṣe na tad ghaṭate,
SA19n1289:98: yadā kaścit kasmaicit kimapyupadiśati tadā tadvacanamavadhāryate kevalam,
SA19n1289:103: na tatra jalādiṣu dṛṣṭeṣu snānapānādikriyeva kā'pyarthakriyāsthitiḥ,
SA19n1289:106: tat cākṣuṣajñānasyeva śrāvaṇajñānasyāpi avabhāsyārthāvadhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samānameveti |
SA19n1289:107: 'jñānānaṃ prāmāṇyāṃ svata eva gṛhyate' iti mīmāṃsakamataṃ nirasyannāha-ata eveti |
SA19n1289:109: amandabuddhestu jātamātre pratyakṣe nirdhāritaviśeṣasya prathamata eva prāmāṇyagrahaḥ,
SA19n1289:116: yogabalājjāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ hi viśadāvabhāsarūpameveti tasya prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva gṛhyate |
SA19n1289:119: na hi sukhe sākṣātkriyamāṇe tasmin saṃśayaḥ |
SA19n1289:122: etena jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva gamyatta iti niyamo nāsmākamityuktaṃ bhavati |
SA19n1289:128: taiḥ kiñcit svataḥ pramāṇamiṣṭam yathā-svasaṃvedanaṃ yogijñānam arthakriyājñānam anumānam abhyāsavacca pratyakṣam |
SA19n1289:137: arthapradarśakatā ca yadyapi prathamotpannajñānasyeva dhārāvāhini dvitīyādijñāne'pyaviśiṣṭā,
SA19n1289:139: ato dvitīyādijñānamanapekṣyaiva tata evaṃ pravarttate puruṣa iti dvitīyādijñānamanyathāsiddhaṃ pravṛttāvanaṅgamiti na tasya prāmāṇyam |
SA19n1289:142: yenaiva hi jñānena prathamamadhigato'rthastenaiva pravarttitaḥ puruṣaḥ,
SA19n1289:145: (nyā. bi. pa.4) vyākhyātaṃ caitadanyatrāsmābhiḥ-arthakriyāsu pravarttamānā anavagatatattatsamarthārthāstadarthāvagataye tadarthāvabhāsakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratīkṣante,
SA19n1289:148: atha yattathāvidhamarthamavabhāsathadapanīya tadajñānamupakaroti tasmai puṃse tat taṃ pramātāramapekṣya tasminnarthe pramāṇam yattu na kiñcidapyupakaroti na tadarthāvabhāsakamapi pramāṇavyavahārapadamadhigacchati |
SA19n1289:150: pramāṇādarthāvadhāraṇāt pūrvaṃ yā tadarthānavagatirajñānalakṣaṇā sā hi vināśyate prathamena pramāṇena tadarthāvadhāraṇalakṣaṇena |
SA19n1289:156: tatsādhāraṇaṃ tu pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyannāha-samyak jñānaṃ pramāṇamityukta iti |
SA19n1289:163: atastasya pramāṇakoṭāvanantarbhāvānna tatsādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kāryamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:164: nanvevaṃ sati sākṣātkāra eva pramāṇamityuktaṃ bhavati,
SA19n1289:166: idaṃ pramākaraṇaṃ yatpramāṇamucyate ityayaṃ phalaphalivibhāgo nopapadyeteti ced anupadaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇanirūpaṇāvasare vakṣyāmaḥ |
SA19n1289:175: nanu rūpadijñāne akṣāṇāmivārthānāmapi hetutvamastīti arthāśritatvamabhipretya pratyarthamiti kutona vyapadeśaḥ |
SA19n1289:178: akṣeṇa tvasādhāraṇaḥ irti pratyakṣaśabdenaiva vyapadeśo yujyate |
SA19n1289:187: asādhāraṇācca vyavahāro dṛśyate yathā yavaśabdo yavāṅkure' iti |
SA19n1289:192: ayaṃ bhavaḥ- akṣāśritatvaṃ pratyakṣaśabdasya vyutpattau nimittaṃ na tu pravṛttinimittaṃ,
SA19n1289:195: tena ca vyutpattinimittena ekārthasamavetaṃ pravṛttinimittaṃ sākṣātkāritvamupalakṣyate |
SA19n1289:196: yathā paṅkajaśabdavyutpattinimittena paṅkajanikarttṛtvena tadekārthasamavetaṃ padmatvaṃ tathā |
SA19n1289:197: uktaṃ ca dharmottarācāryaṇa - ' āśritatvaṃ ca vyutpattinimittaṃ śabdasya,
SA19n1289:201: tataśca yadeva yatkiñcidarthasya sākṣātkārijñānaṃ tatpratyakṣamucyate' iti |
SA19n1289:205: sāmānye vyutpanno'yaṃ śabdo rūḍhyā viśeṣaṃ bodhayatītyetat |
SA19n1289:211: ayamāśayaḥ-parasyāpratipattiṃ vipratipattiṃ vā nivārayan yathāsvasamayaṃ tattallakṣaṇaṃ praṇayannayaṃ parasyāpratipattivipratipattī kathamavagacchati?
SA19n1289:214: tathā paraṃ svābhiprāyaṃ jñāpayannayaṃ vākyaṃ yadā prayuṅkte tadā prayujyamānavākyasya vivakṣāyāṃ liṅgatvamajānatā'pyabhyupagatameveti |
SA19n1289:221: śābdaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti vadatā bāhyārthāvisaṃvāditvena prāmāṇyamaṅgīkarttavyam,
SA19n1289:223: arthaviśeṣaparicchittau śabdaviśeṣasya hetutvaṃ ca tayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandhamantareṇa na saṃbhavati,
SA19n1289:225: unmīlitamātre cakṣuṣi nīlādiparicchittivat śrutamātre śabdaviśeṣe'rthaparicchittiḥ sarveṣāmeva (avyutpannānāmapi) syāt |
SA19n1289:226: ataḥ sambandhaḥ śabdārthayorvācyaḥ sa ka iti vikalpya dūṣayati-śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavannityādinā |
SA19n1289:239: śabdaṃ prati vā'ryasya hetutve sati tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambandho ghaṭeta,
SA19n1289:243: pradīpaghaṭayoḥ prakāśyaprakāśakabhāvasya naisargikatayā pradīpaḥ sattāmātreṇa yathā prakāśayatyarthaṃ tathā śabdārthayoḥ vācyavācakabhāvākhye sambandhe naisargike sati śrutamātraḥ śabdo'viśeṣeṇāsaṅketajñānapi bodhayedarthamityāha-evaṃ tarhīti |
SA19n1289:244: laukiko'pi puruṣo'rthaviśeṣaśabdaviśeṣayoḥ saṅketānabhijñaḥ kaḥ syādityatra puruṣaviśeṣaṃ nidarśayannāha - abhinaveti |
SA19n1289:245: yatra dvīpe'gniśabdasya vyavahāra eva na tato dvīpādāgata iti yāvat |
SA19n1289:246: nanu yadyapi śabdārthayorasti vācyavācakabhāvo naisargikaḥ sambandhaḥ;
SA19n1289:253: evaṃ satyasya prāmāṇyaṃ na hyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:255: āha ca kamalaśīla - ' na hi prakṛtyā'rthapratītihetavo dīpādayaḥ saṅketamapekṣante,
SA19n1289:256: anyathā saṅketasyaivānvayavyatirekābhyāmarthapratītau sāmarthyaṃ syāt na svābhāvikasya sambandhasya' iti (tattvasaṃ. pa. 438). ata iti |
SA19n1289:260: sambandhe sati hyanena śabdenāyamevārtho bodhya iti nirṇayaḥ syāt |
SA19n1289:261: sambandhābhāvādaviśeṣādvivakṣitārtha evānena śabdena bodhyeteti nirṇayo naiva bhavediti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:262: anupapadyamānamapi sambandhaṃ tuṣyatviti nyāyenābhyupagamyāpi dūṣayati-astu veti |
SA19n1289:264: niyate vastunaḥ svabhāve nākṣepāvasara ityabhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate-atha vaktavyamiti |
SA19n1289:269: gnirutpadyamāno nisargata eva dāhakaśaktiviśiṣṭa evotpadyate tathā śabdaviśeṣo'rthaviśeṣapratyāyakaśaktiviśiṣṭa evotpadyate ityabhiprāyeṇa pareṇa kriyamāṇāṃ śaṅkāmanūdya pratikṣipati-nacaivaṃ vaktavyamityādinā |
SA19n1289:273: yacca parairāptoccāritaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇamityucyate tad dūṣayati-nāpyāptapraṇītaśabdānāmiti |
SA19n1289:274: anāptānuccāritaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇamiti vadatāṃ vedasyāpauruṣeyatvena svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ varṇayatāṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayati-sambandhadūṣaṇenaivati |
SA19n1289:277: prayokturarthavivakṣāyā vaco liṅgatayā jñāpakaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:283: sā vivakṣā taddhetuḥ tasya prayujyamānasya vacaso hetuḥ,
SA19n1289:295: asati tasmin kathaṃ jñānasya prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:299: atideśavākyaṃ śrutvā vanaṃ gataḥ piṇḍaviśeṣaṃ yadā paśyati tadā'sya piṇḍāparokṣamātram |
SA19n1289:302: nanu piṇḍadarśanasamanantaramayaṃ gavayapadavācya iti bhavati samākhyāsaṃbandhagrahaḥ,
SA19n1289:304: ato'sti viṣayo yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ samākhyeti |
SA19n1289:311: imau sambhandhinau anayoścāyaṃ sambhandha iti vadatā vaktavyaṃ kimasau sambhandho dṛśya utādhṛśyaḥ |
SA19n1289:314: sambhandhī yadā dṛśyate tadā dṛśyeta so'pi,
SA19n1289:316: tasmāt sambhandho na pāramārthika iti śabdārthayoḥ samākhyā sambandhastatprakāśakatayopamāyāḥ prāmāṇyamityetannaiva ghaṭata itibhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:319: yatra tu bhinnā tatra na tadaiva tadupalabhyeta,
SA19n1289:325: na hi ghaṭapaṭayoḥ sattāmātraṃ ghaṭapaṭau saṃyuktāviti buddhau hetuḥ,
SA19n1289:327: ataḥ saṃyogo nāma tābhyāmanyo vaiśiṣṭyapratītiniyāmakaḥ svīkāryaḥ,
SA19n1289:333: ayamāśayaḥ- sarveṣāmeva satāṃ kṣaṇikatvena saṃyuktapratītigocararyoviśliṣtapratītigocarābhyāṃ bhinnatvena tayoreva ca sambaddhapratyayahetutvena tābhyamatiriktasya sambaddasyānapekṣaṇād viśiṣṭabuddhiḥ sambandhamatiriktaṃ kalpayituṃ na prabhavatīti |
SA19n1289:334: idamatra bodhyam -- yo gosadṛśaḥ sa gavaya iti tu śvāvaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ |
SA19n1289:336: pīṇḍaviśeṣadarśanaṃ tu tadanantarabhāvi piṇḍaviśeṣaprakāśakatayā tanmātre pramāṇam |
SA19n1289:339: dṛṣṭe piṇḍaviśeṣe tataḥ paścād yaśca samākhyāsambandhagrahaḥ so'pi gavayasāmānye bauddha eva vastunīti smṛtito na bahirbhavati |
SA19n1289:340: api ca samākhyāsambandhagrahopāyāścānye'pi santi yathā--kaṃ pika iti pṛṣṭe kaścidāha,
SA19n1289:341: yo madhuraṃ rauti sa pika iti,
SA19n1289:365: sādṛṣyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛṣyamupamānaviṣayastena varṇyate iti |
SA19n1289:366: ayamāśayaḥ- pūrvaṃ grāme gāṃ dṛṣṭvā paścāt jātu vanaṃ gato gavayaṃ paśyati,
SA19n1289:367: tadā tasya bhavati sapadi piṇḍaviśeṣapratyakṣamālocanātmakaṃ jñānaṃ,
SA19n1289:368: tataśca gosadṛśo'yaṃ paśuriti viśeṣato viniścayaḥ savikalpakaḥ |
SA19n1289:370: tataśca bhavati ' anena paśunā sadṛśo gau' riti jñānam |
SA19n1289:372: asya ca viṣayo gavayasādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gauḥ goniṣṭhaṃ vā sādṛśyam |
SA19n1289:379: tasmād yat smaryate tat syāt sādṛśyena viśeṣitam |
SA19n1289:381: pratyakṣeṇāvaruddhe ca sādṛśye ca gavi smṛte |
SA19n1289:392: tad dṛṣṭābhyāṃ piṇḍābhyāmamanyat sādṛśyaṃ nāma na pramāṇagocaramiti yāvat |
SA19n1289:397: ayamāśayaḥ-nanvayamanena sadṛśa iti yeyaṃ pratītiḥ saiva sādṛśye liṅgam,
SA19n1289:401: tau svahetorutpannau tāvevāyamanena sadṛśāviti pratyaye hetū,
SA19n1289:402: iti na tato'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastu siddhyati |
SA19n1289:406: svayameva pramāṇāntarasiddhayoḥ sādṛśyapiṇḍayorviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvamātrasyopamānapramāṇaviṣayatāṃ bruvan sādṛśyaṃ kena pramāṇena siddhyatīti puṣṭe anenaivopamānapramāṇeneti kathaṃ bruyāt,
SA19n1289:408: idamatra bodhyam-gosadṛśe gavaye dṛṣṭe anubhūtapūrve gavi etatsadṛśo gauritivat etadvisadṛśasturaga iti bhavatyanubhūtapūrve turage,
SA19n1289:409: tadasyā vaisādṛśyapratīterapi pramānāntaratā kiṃ na syāt |
SA19n1289:412: evaṃ taruśreṇyāṃ dṛśyamānāyāṃ prathamatarudarśane'nadhigatamādyatvaṃ dvitīyatarudarśanāntaraṃ dṛṣṭapūrve tarāvādyatvamadhigamyate 'sa tarurādya' iti |
SA19n1289:416: tadvaisādṛśyavijñānaṃ yat tadanyā pramā na kim |
SA19n1289:426: yadi prāmāṇyaṃ tadā'numāna evāntarbhāva iti yāvat |
SA19n1289:429: pramāṇadṛṣṭo'rthaḥ- divā'bhuñjānasya pīnatvaṃ jīvato gṛhe'bhāva ityādiḥ |
SA19n1289:434: asati ca tasya tasminnarthe prāmāṇyameva na |
SA19n1289:435: yathā divā'bhuñjānasya yat pīnatvaṃ tasya ca rātribhojanasya ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prabibandho'stīti rātribhojane kāraṇe pīnatvaṃ kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavitumarhatītyanumānānna pṛthagarthāpattestatra prāmāṇyam |
SA19n1289:436: yattu mīmāṃsakaḥ prāha - divā'bhuñjānasya pīnatvaśravaṇād rātrau bhuṅkte iti vākyaṃ parikalpyate iti |
SA19n1289:437: tadetadasambandhānnopapadyate iti na tatra pramaṇaṃ kimapi |
SA19n1289:442: niścitaṃ tena sambandhād vastuno vastuto gatiḥ ||
SA19n1289:452: āha ca śabarasvāmī - 'abhāvo'pi pramāṇābhāvaḥ nāstītyarthasyāsannikṛṣṭasya' iti |
SA19n1289:456: iti | abhāvapramāṇatayābhimatāṃ pramāṇapañcakānutpattiṃ vikalpya dūṣayati - tatra keyamityādinā |
SA19n1289:482: pratyakṣādyanutpattirityatra kiṃ jñānamātraṃ vivakṣitamuta jñānaviśeṣa iti vikalpamabhipretya jñānasāmānyapakṣaṃ nirasyati-deśakāletyādinā |
SA19n1289:487: ekasmin jñāne ghaṭaviśiṣtapratyakṣe yadviṣayatayā sambaddhaṃ bhūtalaṃ-bhūtalamātraṃ tasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣameva pratyakṣādyanutpattirityanenocyate iti yāvat |
SA19n1289:489: yatpradeśaviṣayakaṃ viśiṣṭapratyakṣaṃ tatpradeśaviśeṣaviṣayakameva bhūtalamātrapratyakṣamapīti tadidaṃ pratyakṣamabhāvapramāṇamucyate iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:504: yadṛcchāśabdeṣu nāmnā ḍittha iti jātiśabdeṣu tathā gauriti ' tyādinā (pramāṇa. 12) |

SA19n1289:546: nāmajātyādyabhilāpinī kalpanāpratītirnīlādiśabdaṃ śṛṇvato'ndhasyāpi bhavatyeveti kalpanāyā apyarthajanyatvābhyupaṃgame tasyāpi rūpadarśitvamāpatet |
SA19n1289:552: tathāhīti | ayamāśayaḥ--puraḥsthitaṃ paśyataḥ puruṣasya bhavatu nāmāyaṃ ghaṭa iti nāmānuviddhapratyayaḥ,
SA19n1289:553: tenaivaṃ yadā ghaṭo'nubhūyate tadā''śrayībhūtaṃ bhūtalaṃ nayanagocarībhūtamanubhūyata eva,
SA19n1289:555: tannopapadyate sarvaṃ eva pratyayo nāmānuviddha iti |
SA19n1289:558: unmīlitamātre nayate puraḥsthitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vastu sākṣātkriyata eva,

SA19n1289:564: viparyastāvabhāsakasya jñānasya yathāvasthita-vastugrāhakatvābhāvena na pratyakṣatvamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:571: ayamāśayaḥ -- yadi gacchadvṛkṣapītaśaṅkhādidarśanaṃ bhrāntamiti na tat pratyakṣaṃ,
SA19n1289:575: caladvṛkṣadarśanena pravṛtto vṛkṣaṃ tadvaddeśaṃ vā prāpnoti |
SA19n1289:584: tataḥ-caladvṛkṣādi-darśanād avabhāsitasya vastuno na prāptiḥ kiṃtarhi,
SA19n1289:592: na prāpyate hi tena yathāvabhāsaṃ vastu,
SA19n1289:608: bhāsamānasya varṇasya na ca saṃvāda iṣyate' |
SA19n1289:611: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ- 'pramāṇaṃ bhavad dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ bhavati |
SA19n1289:620: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ - 'yadi mithyājñānaṃ kathaṃ tato vṛkṣāvāptiricet,
SA19n1289:625: yaddeśascāvāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti' iti |

SA19n1289:630: anumānasya sāmānyameva viṣaya iti na tatkalpanāpoḍham |
SA19n1289:631: nanu--kalpanāpoḍhameva cet pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ tasya kathaṃ vyavahārāṅgatā |
SA19n1289:632: na hyanirdeśyamavabhāsayat pravṛttaye nivṛttaye vā prabhavati |

SA19n1289:651: uktaṃ ca kamalaśīlena-'pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamapi sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttamanalādikamarthaṃ tadākāranirbhāsotpattitaḥ parichindadurpadyate |

SA19n1289:665: rūpādipratyakṣe vaṣasyāpi hetutayā viṣayāśrayamityapi vaktuṃ śakyetetyetāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharannāha-indriyapratyakṣamiti vyapadeśasyeti |
SA19n1289:666: uktaṃ ca - 'asādhāraṇahetutvādakṣaistad vyapadiśyate' ti kalpanāpoḍhasyāsya cākṣuṣādervikalpotpādanadvāreṇaiva svāvabhāsite'rthe pramāṇatā,

SA19n1289:679: tadviṣayasantānavartī tadanantarasamutpanno ghaṭādidvitīyakṣaṇaścetyubhayaṃ militvā mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ janayatīti yāvat |
SA19n1289:682: uktaṃca-'hetuḥ pratyayo nimittaṃ karaṇaxxmiti paryāyāḥ' iti |
SA19n1289:686: uttaravijñāne hetubhūtasyaikasantānavartino jñānasya samanantara pratyaya ityeṣā saṃjñā |
SA19n1289:688: uparate cakṣurvyāpāre anukṣaṇaṃ yadvijñānaṃ tena cakṣurvijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakṛtenotpādyate,
SA19n1289:691: asyoktalakṣaṇalakṣitasya mānasapratyakṣasya vyahārapathāgocaratvamityeṣa doṣo na bhavati |

SA19n1289:704: uktena ca lakṣaṇena tat pratyakṣaṃ vivecitaṃ bhavati |

SA19n1289:715: anya eva nīlādibhyo bāhyebhyaḥ sātādaya ābhyantarāḥ,

SA19n1289:721: tadeṣāmavabhāsaḥ svenaivotpanna iti svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣamucyate iti |

SA19n1289:732: sarvameva vastu hetubalādutpadyamānaṃ bhinnabhinnasvabhāvamutpadyate iti vastūnāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣe vyavasthāpakastattaddhetureva,
SA19n1289:737: jñānasya jñānāntara prakāśyatve kiṃ samakālavartinā jñānāntareṇa prakāśyate uta bhinnakālavartineti vikalpya kramād dūṣayati--na tāvaditi |

SA19n1289:743: vastumātrasya kṣaṇikatvena dvitīyakṣaṇe tasya vināśāt kva prakāśāvasaraḥ,

SA19n1289:875: pūrvāparādivibhāgeṣu yadā pūrvo bhāgo dṛśyate tadā tu nāparaḥ,
SA19n1289:876: apare vibhāge tu cakṣuḥpathāgocare naiva bhavati nīlādyavadhāraṇam |
SA19n1289:877: kimaparo vibhāgo nīlo vā śukla iti saṃśaya eva |
SA19n1289:880: tasmāt keśa eko nopalabhyate sa eva saṃhata upalabhyate,
SA19n1289:884: ato yuktaṃ bhāgā eva bhāsanta iti |
SA19n1289:889: na hi tantubhyo'nyaḥ pato nāmāvayavī dṛśyate,
SA19n1289:890: tathā tathā saṃniviṣṭāstantava eva tu dṛśyante |

SA19n1289:901: kṣaṇavināśiṣu sarveṣu bhāveṣu kriyāyāḥ kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ |

SA19n1289:918: yā cānīlabodhavyāvṛttilakṣaṇā nīlabodhātmatā saiva tasya phalarūpatā,
SA19n1289:925: sādhyasādhanabhāvanibandhano hi sa iti śaṅkāṃ vyudasyannāha--etaccetyanena |
SA19n1289:927: ekasyāpyākārabhedena sa hyupapadyate yadyapyatra nāsti paramārthato bhedo vastunaḥ,
SA19n1289:930: iyaṃ ca phalaphalibhāvavyavasthā pratyakṣasamanantarasamutpannena savikalpakena vyavasthāpyata iti |
SA19n1289:931: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--'tasmādasārūpyavyāvṛttyā sārūpyaṃ jñānasya vyavasthāpanahetuḥ anīlabodhavyāvṛttyā ca nīlabodharūpatvaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ,
SA19n1289:938: iti | vyākhyātaṃ caitat kamalaśīlena--'bāhye'rthe prameye viṣayādhigamaḥ pramāṇaphalaṃ,
SA19n1289:942: samanantaraślokavyākhyāne ca --nīlāspadaṃ saṃvedanaṃ na pītasyeti viṣayādhigati-vyavasthāyā arthasārūpyameva nibandhanaṃ nānyaditi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvena sādhyasādhanavyavasthā,
SA19n1289:943: ' ' tasmāt sākārameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na nirākāraṃ..................... vyavasthā ca tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena vikalpena veditavye'ti |

SA19n1289:965: iti | pratyakṣe pramāṇatatphalayorvastubhedo nāstītyatra dharmakīrtavacanaṃ pramāṇayati-yathoktamiti |
SA19n1289:973: lakṣaṇa eva hi prathamato jijñāsā samudeti |
SA19n1289:975: sati samanugate lakṣaṇe prathamaṃ tadeva nirūpaṇiyam |
SA19n1289:979: tat prathamaṃ vibhajyaiva tayorlakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti yukto vibhāgaḥ |
SA19n1289:1004: saktasaṃsūcaka evānumānasaṃjñāniveśāt tenendriyasyāvinābhāvitvasaṃbandhajñānasya ca parārthānumānatvaprasaṅgādatiprasaṅgo na bhavati |
SA19n1289:1014: sapakṣeṣu saṃbaddhaṃ vipakṣebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ pakṣe ca saṃbaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ paśyataḥ pakṣāṃśena bhavati liṅge sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniścaya iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1020: tatra pakṣadharmatāsaṃjñakaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamāha--anumeye sattvameva niścitamiti |
SA19n1289:1031: tatra pakṣa-sattvaṃ cedrūpaṃ neṣyate tadā'siddhe liṅgābhāse'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāttannimasāya tadrūpamupāttamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1038: nānena sarveṣu taruṣu siṣādhayiṣitaṃ cetanatvaṃ siddhyet,
SA19n1289:1039: tasmāt pakṣaikadeśāsiddhaḥ asartyevakāre kasmiṃścittarau vivakṣitasya svāpasya sattvādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt |
SA19n1289:1043: paśyato'sya taṃ dhūmo vā bāṣpo veti yadā saṃśayo'bhūt,
SA19n1289:1046: atra pakṣasattvaṃ mātrajñātamiti bhavatyatiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1049: trarūpyāṃśe ced bhramastena jāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ nānumānaṃ bhrama eva,
SA19n1289:1051: na hyakṣamiva sattayaiva liṅgaṃ jñānaṃ janayituṃ prabhavati |
SA19n1289:1057: tathā ca sati bhavatyasādhāraṇe sapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛtte pakṣamātravṛttāvasādhāraṇe'tiprasaṅga iti |
SA19n1289:1060: iti ca vartata ityarthaḥ -- liṅgasyedaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamapi vartata iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1065: yadyapi tṛtīyaṃ rūpaṃ vipakṣe'sattvamityetanna viruddha iti na tatrātiprasaṅgāvakāśaḥ |
SA19n1289:1067: saṃpakṣa eva sattvamiti dvitīyarūpagamyaṃ tu tat |
SA19n1289:1068: upātte tu vipakṣāsattve sapakṣe sattvopādānasya asādhāraṇavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanam |
SA19n1289:1069: śabdo nityaḥ śrāvaṇatvādityatra pakṣamātravṛtti śrāvaṇatvaṃ vipakṣata iva sapakṣato'pi hi vyāvṛttam |
SA19n1289:1070: sattvaśabdātpūrvasminnevakāreṇeti sapakṣe sattvamevetyanuktvā sapakṣa eva sattvamityuktyetyarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1071: sattvamevetyuktāvayogavyavacchedena sarveṣu sapakṣeṣu sattvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syāt,
SA19n1289:1072: tathā ca sati--prayatnānantarīyakatvena liṅgena śabde'nityatvasādhanaṃ vyāhanyeta |
SA19n1289:1074: nahi vidyudādāvanityatayā niścate prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ netyetāvatā tasyānityatvasādhakatvaṃ hīyate |
SA19n1289:1075: sapakṣeṣu sattvamevetyayogavyavacchedārthakaivakāragrahaṇe tu vidyudādau prayatnānantarīyakatvābhāvena tasya hetutvaṃ hīyate iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1086: dvitīyasya rūpasya sapakṣe sattvasyābhāvāditi śaṅkā parāstā |
SA19n1289:1088: vipakṣaikadeśavṛtteritiśeṣaḥ dhūme sādhye'gnau hetau sādhāraṇe'sti pakṣe sattvaṃ sapakṣe ca mahānasādau sattvam,
SA19n1289:1089: vipakṣe ca kvacit hrade'sattvaṃ ceti trayāṇāmapi rūpāṇāṃ sattvādatiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA19n1289:1090: evakāragrahaṇe cāyogavyavacchedalābhāt sarvebhyo vipakṣebhyo vyāvṛttatvalābhāt vipakṣe'yogolake vahneḥ sattvānnātiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1091: nanu sapakṣa eva sattvamityavadhāraṇagarbhaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamuktam,
SA19n1289:1097: tat adhunā avadhāraṇāghaṭitameva tu dvitīyaṃ rūpaṃ bodhyam |
SA19n1289:1099: vītarāgo'pi lokakalyāṇāyedaṃ vaktīti vadantaṃ vādiṇaṃ prayogeṇa nirasyati kaścit--avītarāgo'yaṃ puruṣaḥ vaktṛtvāt rathyāpuruṣavat iti |
SA19n1289:1103: sa na vaktā iti upalakhaṇḍādinidarśanena vyatireke samarthyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ upalagvaṇḍasyāvaktṛtvaṃ kiṃ vītarāgatvakṛtamuta svata eveti,
SA19n1289:1107: idaṃ ca vākyaṃ 'niścitagrahaṇene'tyataḥ prāk 'evakāreṇa sādhāraṇasye'tyatraiva sthānamarhati |
SA19n1289:1108: iha tu--evakāraḥ asattvagrahaṇātprāgeva 'asapakṣa evāsattva'miti kuto nopātta ityasya prayojanaṃ vaktavyam,
SA19n1289:1109: tacca dharmoddharācāryeṇo dāhṛtam--'asattvavacanāt pūrvasminnavadhāraṇe'yamarthaḥ syāt vipakṣe eva yo nā'sti sa hetuḥ |
SA19n1289:1110: tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sapakṣe'pi sarvatra nāsti |
SA19n1289:1116: ayamāśayaḥ--tridhā bhavanti vipakṣāḥ sādhyābhāvavān sādhyavadanya sādhyaviruddhaśceti |
SA19n1289:1125: yatra na vahnistatra na dhūma ityabhāvato bhavati vipakṣaḥ,
SA19n1289:1126: yatra tu tādātmyaṃ--vṛkṣatādātmyaṃ śiśupāyāṃ tatra yo na vṛkṣaḥ sa na śiśupeti bhedataḥ |
SA19n1289:1127: uṣṇo'yaṃ pradeśo vahnerityatra uṣṇaviruddhaḥ śītaḥ pradeśo bhavati vipakṣaḥ,
SA19n1289:1131: teṣveteṣu vipakṣeṣu yathāyogyaṃ vyatireko bodhya iti vivekadyotanāya tṛtīyasya pṛthagupādānamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1134: anvayayirūpavat vyatirekirūpamapi yo dhūmavān so'gnimān yo niragnaḥ sa nirdhūma iti prayoktavyamityetajjñāpanāyeti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1135: yadvā--prayoge kartavye niyamajñāpanārtham--ayamāśayaḥ--prayoge hi anvayo vyatireko vā niyamavāneva prayoktavyo na tadvirahitaḥ |
SA19n1289:1136: anyathā śyāmo'yaṃ tatputratvādityapi prayogaḥ sādhuḥ syāt,
SA19n1289:1138: yastu na śyāmaḥ sa na tatputra iti anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogasaṃbhavāt |
SA19n1289:1142: sati niyame dvayoranyataraprayoga eva tu paryāptaḥ,
SA19n1289:1148: trirūpāṇīti padaṃ vyācaṣṭe--trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tānīti |
SA19n1289:1151: sukhapratipatteḥ prasiddheśca vibhajanakramavyutkrameṇa trīṇi tāni nirūpayati--tatra kāryamityādinā prayogamukhena |
SA19n1289:1172: nanvanavayavabhūtamapi yathā mahānase iti dṛṣṭāntapadaṃ prayujyate,
SA19n1289:1173: tathā pratijñāvacanaṃ prathamaṃ prayoge siṣādhayiṣitajñāpanāya prayoktavyamiticet evaṃ sati vādinaṃ prativādinaṃ vā prayoganirdeśe pravartayat 'śabdasyānityatvaṃ sādhaya,
SA19n1289:1174: nityatvaṃ sādhaye' tyādi prerayiturvacanamapi tathā syāt |
SA19n1289:1185: iti | pratijñāyā avayavānaṅgatvenānupayuktatve siddhe pañcamyantahetuprayogasya kvopayoga ityāha -- pratijñāmantareṇeti |
SA19n1289:1193: ataeva ca nigamanamucyate anena cābādhitatvāśaṅkā nirasyata iti cet |
SA19n1289:1195: yat śaṅkāvakāśa-eva nāstiḥ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvacanābhyāmeva pakṣe sādhyasya niścayāt |
SA19n1289:1200: na viparyayaśaṅkā'sti vyarthaṃ nigamanaṃ vacaḥ ||' iti |
SA19n1289:1203: dṛśye agnyādau sādhye dṛśyo dhūmādiriti yāvat |
SA19n1289:1209: tasmāt pratyakṣānupalabdhā agneḥ kāryaṃ dhūma iti niścīyata iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1211: cakṣurāderadṛśyatvena pratyakṣānupalambhasyāsaṃbhavāt kādācitkatvena rūpādijñānasya cakṣurādikāryatvaṃ niścīyate iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1219: na ca rūpātmā rasa iti pareṣāmāśaṅkāyāmucyate -- ekasāmagryadhīnatvena bhavati rasena rūpānumānamiti |
SA19n1289:1234: tasmin rūpasantānalakṣaṇe puñje pūrvarasaḥ sahakārikāraṇamisyate uttarapuñje rasānubhavāt |
SA19n1289:1236: evaṃ ca sati rūpasāmagrī rasaghaṭitā rasasāmagrī rūpaghaṭitā,
SA19n1289:1241: hetoryā sattā tayaiva bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa svasattāmātrabhāvī,
SA19n1289:1242: tasmin sādhye sa hetuḥ svabhāva ucyate |
SA19n1289:1246: tasmin sādhye svabhāvo heturucyate iti saṃbandhaḥ |
SA19n1289:1256: avagata eva sa vṛkṣa iti siddhasya kathaṃ sādhyateti |
SA19n1289:1259: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--'pracuraśiṃśupe deśe'viditaśiṃśupāvyavahāro jaḍaḥ kenaciduccāṃ śiṃśupāmupadarśyocyate vṛkṣo'yamiti,
SA19n1289:1262: tadā sa mūḍhaḥ śiṃśupātvamātranimitte vṛkṣavyavahāre pravartyate' iti |
SA19n1289:1283: upalambhasya yāni pratyayāntarāṇi--ālambanādanyāni kāraṇāni indriyādīni tatsākalyāt |
SA19n1289:1301: paryudāsavṛttyāśrayaṇena anyasya yasyakasyacit jñānamanupalabhaśabdārthatayā na grāhyamityāha--nāpītti |
SA19n1289:1306: na tu yaḥ kaścana pradeśo yatkiñcid jñānamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1307: uktaṃ ca dharmottarācāryeṇa--'tasmāt sa eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśastadālambanaṃ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvād dṛśyānupalambha ucyate' iti |
SA19n1289:1311: abhāve pratyakṣeṇāvagamyamāne tadvyavahāro'pi nenaiva bhavediti tasya vā kutaḥ sādhanāpekṣā,
SA19n1289:1316: tamimaṃ bhedamabhipretya karmadharmapakṣe svabhāvaṃ saṃbandhaṃ kartṛdharmapakṣe kāryatvaṃ saṃbandhaṃ copapādayati--tathāhītyādinā |
SA19n1289:1324: deśataḥ kālataḥ svabhāvato vā yo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sa hi nopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ,
SA19n1289:1329: idaṃ ca ' amūḍhasmṛtisaṃskārasye'tyādi 'sādhinī' tyantaṃ vacanamācāryadharmakīrtinā nyāyabindāvuktam |
SA19n1289:1330: (nyāya vi. 105) ayamasyārthaḥ--amūḍhaḥ abhraṣṭaḥ smṛtijanakaḥ saṃskāro yasmin ghaṭādāvarthe so'yamamūḍhasmṛtisaṃskāraḥ,
SA19n1289:1332: tathā vartamānasya ca pratipattṛpratyakṣasya--pratipattuḥ pratyakṣo ghaṭādirarthaḥ,
SA19n1289:1334: nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ cedaṃ vacanaṃ vistareṇa vyākhyātam | (nyāya vi. ṭī. 33)
SA19n1289:1353: atra ca dhūmakāraṇasya vyavahitatvenādṛśyatayā kāryānupalambho bhavati liṅgam |
SA19n1289:1357: niṣedhyasya dhūmasya yatkāraṇaṃ dahanastasyānupalabdheridaṃ sādhyate --nātra dhūmo dahanābhāditi |
SA19n1289:1358: nanu dahanasced dṛśyeta tatprabhavo dhūmo'pi dṛśyetaiva,
SA19n1289:1359: yadi sa nopalabhyate sopīti dṛśyānupalambhenaiva dhūmābhāvasyāpi niścayasaṃbhavāt kimiti tatsādhanaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA19n1289:1360: ucyate--viralatamasi prabhātasamaye hrade hemantasamaye aghisalilaṃ paritaḥ prasṛtaṃ bāṣpamavalokya dhūmo'yatisandihānaḥ,
SA19n1289:1367: yastu avagataśiṃśupāviśeṣaḥ tasya tu dṛśyānupalabdhyaiva tadabhāvaḥ siddhati | 4 |
SA19n1289:1385: sarvaṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvana kāraṇasantāneṣu pūrvapūrveṣu na sarvameva kāryotpādanasamaryam,
SA19n1289:1386: tathā sati pūrvapūryasamaya eva kāryotpādaprasaṅgāt tasmāt pūrvapūrvakṣaṇātmani kāraṇasantāne yadantimakṣaṇātmakaṃ kāryādavyahitapūrvakṣaṇarūpaṃ tadevāpratibaddhasāmarthyamityāśayaḥ | 6 |
SA19n1289:1397: yadā dūrātpaśyati puruṣaṃ vahniṃ ca tatrāyaṃ prayogo bhavati |
SA19n1289:1401: sannihite tu puruṣe upalambhayogyasyāpi romaharṣādiviśeṣasyānupalambhād dṛśyānupalabdhyaiva tadabhāvaḥ sidhyet |
SA19n1289:1402: tathopalambhayogyasya śītasyānupalabdhyā kāraṇānupalabdhyaiva tasya siddhiḥ syāt | 7 |
SA19n1289:1406: tuṣārasparśo yadā nopalambhayogyo nāpi śītaṃ tatra vahnimātropalambhādbhavatyayaṃ hetuḥ |
SA19n1289:1409: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yo viruddhastasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1412: svabhāve upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tu svabhāvānupalabdhyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet tadviruddhe copalabhyamāne viruddhopalambhādeva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet | 9 |
SA19n1289:1414: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yo viruddhastasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1416: śītakāraṇānāṃ tatkāryasya śītasya tadviruddhasya vahneśca yadā nopalambhayogyatā tadā'yaṃ hetuḥ |
SA19n1289:1417: anyathā tu svabhāve upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet |
SA19n1289:1421: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yo viruddhaḥ,
SA19n1289:1422: tasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdherityarthaḥ udāharati--na romaharṣādīti |
SA19n1289:1423: pratiṣedhye romaharṣādau tatkāraṇe kāraṇaviruddhe copalambhāyogye bhavatyayaṃ hetuḥ |
SA19n1289:1425: kāraṇe vā upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhyā kāraṇānupalabdhyā vā kāraṇaviruddhe upalabhyamāne kāraṇaviruddhopalambhena vā pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet | 11 |
SA19n1289:1427: pratiṣedhyasya yad vyāpakaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yatkāryaṃ tadupalabdhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1429: dūrādeva dhūmamātraṃ paśyatastena bhavati nātra tuṣārasparśa iti tatpratiṣedhānumānam |
SA19n1289:1430: tuṣārasparśaṃ tadvyāpake śīte vopalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tadviruddhe vahnau vopalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhiḥ vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhirvā syāt | 12 |
SA19n1289:1432: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yo viruddhastasya yadyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1438: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yadvyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1441: kārye vahnāvupalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tu kāryānupalabdhiḥ syāt tadviruddhe śīte upalabhyamāne kāryaviruddhopalabdhireva liṅga syāt,
SA19n1289:1444: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yat viruddhaṃ tasya yadvyāpyaṃ tadupalabdhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1449: iha tu kāraṇaviruddhavyāptatuṣāramātramanubhūyata iti tena dhūmapratiṣedhāt kāraṇaviruddhavyāptopalabdherbhavati kāryapratiṣedhaḥ | 15 |
SA19n1289:1451: pratiṣedhyasya yabdyāpakaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yadavyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1454: iha tu tadviruddhavyāptopalambhāt vyāpakapratiṣedha iti viśeṣaḥ | 16 |
SA19n1289:1494: idaṃ ca svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavataḥ prayogasyodāharaṇaṃ bhavitumarhati,
SA19n1289:1498: jñānamātrāstitve tu sarvamiti nirdeśo nātīva svarasaḥ |
SA19n1289:1499: yadvā--sādharmyavantaṃ prayogaṃ pradarśayituṃ sautrāntikamatamāśritya vyutpādyate ityanvayaḥ |
SA19n1289:1509: ta ete samavetā hetavaḥ pratyayā ucyanta ityabhipretyāha--pretyayairiti |
SA19n1289:1510: hetuṃ hetuṃ prati ayante hetvantarāṇīti teṣāmayamānānāṃ yo bhāvaḥ sa pratyaya ucyate |
SA19n1289:1516: tatrāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ neti pareṣāṃ vādastu pratyakṣopahataḥ |
SA19n1289:1517: saugataṃmanyāḥ vātsīputrīyāḥ punaḥ buddhiśabdādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāmakṣaṇikatvaṃ cābhyupagacchanti |
SA19n1289:1518: tān pratyeṣa prayogaḥ -- buddhiśabdādaya iva sarvameva kṣaṇikam saṃskṛtatvāditi |
SA19n1289:1519: kṣaṇikamityetad vyācaṣṭe--utpattikṣāṇa eveti utpattikṣaṇamātrasthāyitā kṣaṇikatvamiti yāvat |
SA19n1289:1520: nanu kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ tiṣṭhanti khalu te samutpannā utpattyanantaramapīti-śaṅkāṃ nirasyannāha--sarvaṃ tāvadityādinā |
SA19n1289:1525: nanu nāvinaśvarasvabhāvā na vā vinaśvarasvabhāvā utpadyante kintu kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitisvabhāvā utpādyante ityāśaṅkāmanūdya nirasyati--athedṛśa eva svabhāva iti |
SA19n1289:1527: ayamāśayaḥ-- kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitveti yā kila maryādā kalpyate seyamaniyateti punarapi tāvantaṃ kālaṃ kuto'yaṃ na tiṣṭhet svabhāvāniyateranavasthiteriti |
SA19n1289:1539: tasmāt nāśakasamavadhāne nāśo jāyate nocenneti kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanamiticet |
SA19n1289:1543: na ca vināśo nāma kimapi vastu |
SA19n1289:1555: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ--'bhāvasya hi karaṇaṃ bhavati,
SA19n1289:1558: ato bhāvābhāvātmakaḥ-- bhāvaniṣedhātmako nāśo na kenacit kriyate avastutvāt kharaviṣāṇavat ' iti |
SA19n1289:1562: vinaśvarasvabhāvasya kṣaṇikatāṃ prayogeṇa sādhayannāha--prayogaḥ punaraḥ kartavya iti |
SA19n1289:1569: utpāde nairantaryaṃ apareṣu pūrvasādṛśyaṃ ca viśadayannāha--pūrvakṣāṇavināśakālaeva tatsadṛśaṃ kṣaṇāntaramudayata iti |
SA19n1289:1570: ghaṭātmako yaḥ pūrvakṣāṇaḥ tadvināśakāla eva tatsadṛśaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kṣāṇāntaramudayata ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1583: avyaktabhede iha tu kiṃpunarnyāya-siddho'bhedabhrama iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1591: ātmākāśādayo hi nityā bhāvāḥ santīti parapakṣavāsanāmūlakāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharan sarvaśabdena kroḍīkṛtaṃ viśadayati--pramāṇapratītāḥ padārthā iti |
SA19n1289:1592: ātmādiṣu pramāṇaṃ nāstīti te śasaśṛṅgāyanta iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1601: saiva vyāvṛttiḥ kalpitaṃ dharmabhedamāśritya nīlasyotpattiriti anīlavyāvṛttyātmano vyavacchedena vyatiriktevocyate |
SA19n1289:1603: tamimaṃ kalpitaṃ viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhedamāśritya utpattimattvāditi heturayaṃ prayukta iti saviśeṣaṇasvabhāvaheturayaṃ bhavatīti |
SA19n1289:1606: tat sanniti śabdo'pi asadvyāvṛtte'sadvyāvṛttyā pravartate tat satvāditi yaḥ svabhāvahetuḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ so'pyutpattimattvamiva saviśeṣaṇaheturbhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1609: pūrvasmin 'yatsattadanityaṃ santaścāmī bhāvā' ityasmin prayoge sadityeva dharmī nirdiśyate |
SA19n1289:1611: nātra sattvenāsattvavyāvṛttirūpeṇa kalpitena dharmabhedena kimapi viśeṣyate,
SA19n1289:1614: utpattimāṃśca śabda ityatra yadutpattimadityutpattyā viśeṣato dharmī nirdiśyate anutpattivyāvṛttilakṣaṇayotpattyā viśeṣitastato vyatirikta iva dharmī nirdiśyate |
SA19n1289:1615: utpattimāṃśca śabda iti śabdasya dharmiṇo dharma iva samāropitabhedā utpattirnirdiśyate |
SA19n1289:1623: devadattāddharmiṇo bahirbhūtāścitrā gāvo viśeṣaṇatayā viśeṣaṇatayā vivakṣitā iti bhinnaviśeṣaṇatā tatra vyaktaṃ gamyate,
SA19n1289:1624: kṛtakamiti nirdeśastu kāryamiti nirdeśādaviśiṣṭaḥ kāryasvabhāvaṃ kāryatāmeva gamayatīti kathaṃ bhinnaviśeṣaṇateti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1628: itthaṃ ca citraguśabdavat dharmisvarūpānantargataparavyāpārasāpekṣatvasya viśeṣaṇasyāvabodhanāt bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvahetorayaṃ prayogo bhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1630: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ kṛtaka' iti (nyā. bi. pa. 109) |
SA19n1289:1631: vyākhyātaṃ caitat dharmottarācāryeṇa--'upādhibhedena svabhāvasya prayoga iti saṃbandhaḥ upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ,
SA19n1289:1632: tasya bhedena bhinnopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvahetuḥ prayukta ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1641: kṛtakatvaṃ vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇam x x x x x yasmādapekṣitaparavyāpāraḥ kṛtaka ucyate tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ ucyate |
SA19n1289:1656: mandasya nāyaṃ svabhāva iti vyāmohaḥ syāt,
SA19n1289:1659: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--' tadevaṃ trividhaḥ svabhāvahetuprayogo darśitaḥ,
SA19n1289:1662: mābhūdvācakabhedātkvacitsvabhāvahetāvapi prayukte vyāmoha iti ' iti (nyā. bi. ṭī. 31)
SA19n1289:1669: idaṃ ca nidarśanaṃ sarvāstitvavādibhiḥ saugataikadeśibhiḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtabhedena saṃgṛhya dvedhā vibhakte āryasatye'saṃskṛtakoṭau ākāśapratisaṃkhyānirodhāpratisaṃkhyānirodhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ gaṇanāt bodhyam |
SA19n1289:1679: tathātvāt sa sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyataḥ sādhanābhāvavato'nyatra netyetat |
SA19n1289:1680: yathā svakarmaṇyeva niyata ityukte svakarmaṇo'nyatrānanvayo gamyate tathā tena sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvavyāpakatā labhyate |
SA19n1289:1681: tathā ca vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttiḥ sidhyatīti bodhyam |
SA19n1289:1682: anantarānavasthāyitvābhāvasya yadvyāpakamavinaśvarasvarūpatvaṃ tadrūpādibhyo nivartamānamanantarānavasthāyitvābhāvaṃ tebhyo nivartayat teṣāmantantarānavasthāyitāṃ sādhayati--tadetatpratipāditaṃ vinaśvararūpaṃ ca rūpādikamudayakāla iti |
SA19n1289:1686: utpattimattvenānityatve sādhye vaidharmyaprayogaṃ pradarśayati--yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatrotpattimattvamapīti |
SA19n1289:1689: kṛtakatvenānityatve sādhye vaidharmyaprayogaṃ pradarśayati -- yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatra kṛtakatvamapīti |
SA19n1289:1692: padāntaropasthāpitavyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetorvaidharmyaṃ darśayati--yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapīti |
SA19n1289:1702: evaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ yayoranvayavyatirekasahacārāvavadhāryete tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo'vagamyate iti |
SA19n1289:1703: anavadhārite ca kāryakāraṇabhāve pareṇāpādyamānāprayojakāśaṅkā na nivārayituṃ śakyeteti kāryahetuṃ prayuñjatā prathamaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmavadhārya iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1706: avayevebhyo'tiriktaḥ kaścidavayavī avayaveṣu samaveta iti vadato nirākaraṇāyānupalabdhihetuḥ prayujyate |
SA19n1289:1710: tatra yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatrāsadvyavahārayogyaṃ yathā naraśirasi śṛṅgam,
SA19n1289:1712: nopalabhyate cātropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ parābhimato'vayavī kapāleṣviti pakṣadharmatāpratipādakaṃ vākyam |
SA19n1289:1715: yo yena prakāreṇa parairabhimato'vayavī sa tathā naivopalabhyate,
SA19n1289:1716: nahi bhūtale ghaṭa iva bhūtalādatiriktastadādhārakaḥ pratīyate'vayavī avayaveṣu tadādhārakastebhyo'tiriktaḥ |
SA19n1289:1723: viśeṣaṇavati vartamānastu viśeṣyābhāvarūpa iti sadvyavahārayogye upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvarūpaviśeṣaṇavati vartamāna uktaviśiṣṭābhāvo'nupalabhyamānatvābhavarūpa evetyabhipretya vyatirekavyāptiṃ pradarśayati--yat sadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eveti |
SA19n1289:1724: yattu sadapi nopalabhyate tadupalabdhiyogyaṃ neti viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhāvo bodhyaḥ |
SA19n1289:1730: tathā ca vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyenāpi tato nivṛttena bhāvyamityato'vayavino'vayave'sadvyavahārayogyataiva sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1736: ukteṣu prayogeṣu pareṣāmaprayojakaśaṅkāṃ vārayannāha--tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhāviti |
SA19n1289:1737: ayamāśayaḥ--pratyakṣapramāṇamūlāṃ vyāptiṃ svīkurvatāmasmākaṃ paraiḥ kriyamāṇāyā aprayojakaśaṅkāyā nāvakāśaḥ |
SA19n1289:1744: śṛṅgasyānyatra sattvaṃ śaśe'sattvaṃ ca śaśaśṛṅgayoḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāveva |
SA19n1289:1748: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhavatu mā vā bhūditi |
SA19n1289:1749: atīndriyārthadarśanasamarthaṃ sarvajñaṃ nityamekamīśvaramapyanabhyupagacchanto mīmāṃsakāḥ sarvajñamātranirāsāya prayatante saugatādyabhimatasarvajñapratiṣedhābhiniveśāt |
SA19n1289:1750: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ--iha jagati īśvarādanyaḥ sarvajño bhavatu mā vā bhūt |
SA19n1289:1756: nirūpayiṣyamāṇe īśvarasādhake prayoge pakṣasapakṣavipakṣavibhāgaṃ prathamataḥ pradarśayannupakramate--trayaḥ khalviti |
SA19n1289:1759: ye cānye vanaspatyādayo ye ca mahīmahīdharādayaḥ te sandigdhakartṛkā bhavanti |
SA19n1289:1764: anye ca bhavāḥ sapakṣakoṭau vipakṣakoṭau cāntarbhavanti |
SA19n1289:1769: yanna kāryaṃ tanna sakartṛkaṃ yathā vyomādi,
SA19n1289:1772: sādhyaśarīre buddhimattvaniveśena upādānopakaranādyabhijñena kartrā bhāvyamiti niyamo gamyate |
SA19n1289:1776: hetoraṅgāni ca trīṇi pakṣe sattvaṃ sapakṣe ca sattvaṃ,
SA19n1289:1796: mano nimittamityetāvatā na bāhyārthapratyakṣaṃ mānasamiti vaktuṃ suśakam |
SA19n1289:1798: ghaṭādīnāṃ kāryāṇāṃ kumbhakārādikartṛkatvasya bhūyodarśanāt tatsahakṛtena kāryatvasāmānyalakṣaṇāpratyāsattyā jāyamānena kāryamātrasya sakartṛkatvāvagāhinā'laukikena pratyakṣeṇa sarvatra kārye sakartṛkatvaṃ pratyakṣeṇopalabdhamiti tadāśayaḥ |
SA19n1289:1800: tathāhītyādimūlavākyaṃ kāryaṃ tāvat kumbhakārāderupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodṛṣṭamiti bhūyodarśanasahāyena pratyakṣeṇa kāryaṃ sakartṛkamityupalabhyata iti kathamapi śeṣapūraṇena vyākhyeyam |
SA19n1289:1802: yasmāt kāryasya sakartṛkatvaṃ naisargikamiti pratyakṣeṇāvagataṃ tasmānnedaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ,
SA19n1289:1806: nahi katipayavyaktīnāṃ mithaḥ sāhacaryadarśanamātreṇā tatsāmānyayorvyāptiḥ saṃbhavati |
SA19n1289:1807: nahi katipayaghaṭapaṭavyaktīnāṃ sāhacaryadarśanamātrād bhavati ghaṭapaṭasāmānyayorvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1809: ayamāśayaḥ--pratiniyatā hi kāryeṣu tasya tasya sā sā sāmagrī,
SA19n1289:1810: nahi ghaṭasya yā sāmagrī sā paṭasya,
SA19n1289:1817: yāni ca buddhimatkartṛkāṇyupalabhyante tāni ca dṛśyaśarīrakabuddhimatkartṛkāṇyeva |
SA19n1289:1818: tṛṇādīnāmapi pakṣīkaraṇāt na vyabhicārāśaṅketi tu na yuktam |
SA19n1289:1819: nahi vyabhicāranivāraṇāya vyabhicāraviṣayasya pakṣīkaraṇaṃ yujyata iti |
SA19n1289:1824: iha tu tṛṇādau dṛśyaśarīrasya karturvyatirekaniścayāt tatra tatsādhanāya hetorāśrayo'nupapanna iti |
SA19n1289:1829: ataḥ saṃdehāt parvate vahneḥ sādhanaṃ yuktam |
SA19n1289:1830: iha tu sādhyavyatireko dṛśyānupalambhena niścita iti mahadasti vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1834: adṛśyaśarīrakatvasya sādhyatāvacchedakakoṭāvanupraveśe kulālādidṛśyapuruṣakartṛkatayā prasiddhe ghaṭādāvanaikāntyāśaṅkā syāditi pakṣāntaramāśrayat--buddhimanmātrasya veti |
SA19n1289:1836: sa ca kartā dṛśyaśarīro vā syādadṛśyaśarīro vā,
SA19n1289:1844: na hyadṛśyasya piśācāderabhāvo neha piśāca iti cakṣuṣā garītuṃ śakyate |
SA19n1289:1845: tathā pratiyogiṣu keṣāṃcidadṛsyasvabhāvatvena na tatsāmānyābhāve dṛśyānupalambhasaṃbhavaḥ |
SA19n1289:1846: itthaṃ ca tvayā kartṛṣvadṛśyo'pi kartā yadyabhyupagamyeta taddhiṭitakartṛsāmānyābhāvo dṛśyānupalambhābhāvena naivāvadhāryeta |
SA19n1289:1847: vastuto ghaṭādiṣvapi tvayā kartṛtayā'bhyupagato buddhimān kartā nityaḥ kaścidātmā,
SA19n1289:1848: so'pyadṛśya eveti yogyānupalambhāsaṃbhavena buddhimataḥ karturabhāvo naivāvadhāryeta |
SA19n1289:1850: kāryatvasya tato vyāvṛtterapi saṃdehāt tṛṇādiṣvapi tatsaṃdehasyaiva prasaṅgāt kārye kartṛṣāpekṣatvasaṃsayaḥ syādeveti saṃdighavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ hetordoṣo bhavedeveti |
SA19n1289:1851: idamabhihitaṃ bhavati -- buddhimatkartṛkatve sādhye buddhimatkartṛkatvābhāvavān vipakṣaḥ |
SA19n1289:1854: tathā ca saṃdehena tṛṇādau tadabhāvaḥ sandigdha eveti saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ saṃdigdhānaikāntikatve paryavasitaṃ hetordoṣa eveti |
SA19n1289:1856: yathā'sarvajñaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimānveti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ,
SA19n1289:1857: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevaṃprakārasyānupalambhasyādṛśyātmaviṣayatvena saṃdehahetutvā'-diti | (nyā. vi. 112.) |
SA19n1289:1861: yadakartṛkaṃ na tadutpattimat yathā vyomādīti nidarśanamupalabhyata evetyatrāha--sādhyābhāvaprayuktasyeti |
SA19n1289:1863: vyomādau nityatayā'bhimate kāryatvābhāvaḥ kiṃ kartrabhāvaprayukto vā kartṛnirapekṣakāraṇāntarābhāvaprayukto vetyatra niyāmakābhāvāt kāryatvābhāvasya kartrabhāvaprayuktvānavadhāraṇāt vyāpterasiddheriti |
SA19n1289:1867: saṃbhāvyate'tīndriyaḥ kartā cet -- buddhimatā hi kartrā śarīrendriyamanoviśiṣṭena bhāvyam |
SA19n1289:1870: na dṛśyate ca śarīrī kartā tṛṇādau |
SA19n1289:1871: athātīndriyaśarīro buddhimān kartā tṛṇādau kārye'bhyupagamyate cediti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1874: atha vyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ dṛśyaḥ kartā cettṛṇādāvapyāśrīyate tasya tatrānupalambhādanaikāntikataiva hetorityāśayaḥ |
SA19n1289:1877: yad utpattimat tat sakartṛkaṃ yathā ghaṭādi,
SA19n1289:1881: tādātmyatatadutpattibhyāṃ nāparaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sādhyena hetoriti tu na |
SA19n1289:1882: tathā ca sādhanābhāvasya sādhyābhāvaprayuktatvāditi kiṃ prayojyaprayojakabhāvavicāreṇetīmāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharan parābhimataṃ hetoḥ sādhyena saha svābhāvikatvasaṃbandhavādaṃ nirasyati--yattu trilocanenetyādinā |
SA19n1289:1884: dhūmena vahneḥ saṃbandhe ārdrendhanasaṃyoga iva vahninā dhūmasya saṃbandhe na ko'pyupādhirityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1885: uktaṃ ca vācaspatimiśrarnyāyavartikatātparyaṭīkāyāṃ--' tathāhi dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ,
SA19n1289:1888: yadā tvārdrendhanādisaṃbandhamanubhavanti tadā dhūmādibhiḥ saha saṃbadhyante |
SA19n1289:1889: tasmāt vahnyādīnāmardrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandhaḥ svābhāviko na bhavati |
SA19n1289:1898: tasya tena saha saṃbandhe saṃbandhibhyāṃ yadanyadapekṣyate tadupādhiśabdenābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1901: upādhiśaṅkāyā anivāryatayā na svābhāvikasaṃbandhāvadhāraṇaṃ ghaṭeteti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1906: evaṃ sati prāmāṇikānāmanumānena bhavantī lokayātrā nopapadyeta,
SA19n1289:1909: idaṃ ca vācaspatimiśrairāśaṅkya parihṛtam--' na cādṛśyamāno'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena saṃdihyamāna upādhiḥ svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti sāṃpratam |
SA19n1289:1910: avaśyaṃ śaṅkayā bhavitavyaṃ niyāmakābhāvāditi dattāvakāśā khalviyaṃ laukikapramāṇamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta' iti (nyā. vā. ṭī. 165)
SA19n1289:1912: pūrvapūrvakṣaṇānāmuttarottarakṣaṇeṣu hetutve vaktavye pūrvatvasyottaratvasya cāsaṃkhyāteṣu pūrveṣūttareṣu ca sādhāraṇyenātiprasaṅge prasajati deśakāla jātyādinā sādharmasya sarvasya svalakṣaṇatayā anyānyatvaṃ vadatāṃ saugatānāmasaṃbhavādanyatvāviśeṣe'pi kasyacideva kṣaṇasya kasmiṃścideva kṣaṇe hetutvaṃ yathā'bhimataṃ tathā kasyacideva kenacideva svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti mamāpyabhimatamityāśayaḥ |
SA19n1289:1914: pramāṇasiddhaṃ vahnidhūmayorhetumadbhāvameva tayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ vadatāmasmākaṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ svābhāvikaṃ saṃbandhaṃ tayoḥ kalpayatāṃ yuṣmākaṃ ca mahadasti vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1915: svābhāvikaśabdārthaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti ko'rtha iti |
SA19n1289:1916: bhūyodarśanamātrasya vyāptiniścayādhāyakatvaṃ na yujyata ityāśayenāha--sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāpterapi siddhiriti |
SA19n1289:1924: yo vahnidhūmayoḥ pratibandhaḥ hetuhetumadbhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tadgrāhakaṃ yatpramāṇaṃ anvayasahacāravyatirekasahacāralakṣaṇaṃ tatsmaraṇadvāreṇetyarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1925: gṛhītaṃ vismṛtaṃ ca yatpratibandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsmaraṇadvāreṇeti vā tadarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:1927: nahi vyomādau sakartṛkatvābhāvotpattimattvābhāvayoḥ sāhacaryadarśanamātreṇeti prakṛte tātparyam |
SA19n1289:1930: ayamāśayaḥ--utpattimattvena buddhimatkartṛkatvaṃ sādhayatā tatra vyomādi vyatirekanidarśanatayā pradarśayatā tvayā vyomādīnāmutpattirāhityasya buddhimatkartrabhāvaprayuktatvamupapādanīyam,
SA19n1289:1932: tatra buddhimata iva tato'nyasyācetanasyāpi kāraṇasyābhāvo vartata ea |
SA19n1289:1933: tathā ca cetanādhiṣṭhitādapi svasvakāraṇād bījādestṛṇādikamudbhavatīti vadatāṃ yo'bhimatastathāvidhakāraṇād bījādestṛṇādikamudbhavatīti vadatāṃ yo'bhimatastathāvidhakāraṇābhāvaḥ tatprayuktatvameva vyomāderanutpattimattve prayojakaṃ kiṃ na syāt |
SA19n1289:1935: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kartṛtvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyata iti |
SA19n1289:1936: ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśane taṃ vinā tasyotpattirmābhūt |
SA19n1289:1938: nahyanyatra dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇamanyatra na dṛśyata ityetāvatā'nyasyānutpattau tattantraṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1939: nanu dhūmena vahnyādau sādhye vipakṣe dhūmasyādarśanāt dhūmābhāvo vahnyabhāvaprayukto yathā bhavati,
SA19n1289:1940: tathā vyomni vipakṣe upalabhyamāna utpattyabhāvo buddhimadabhāvaprayuktaḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkyāha--kiṃcādarśanamātreṇeti |
SA19n1289:1941: vipakṣe hetoradarśanamātreṇa cet tasya vyatirekaḥ sidhyet,
SA19n1289:1943: na ca hetoradarśanamātreṇa hetvabhāvaḥ sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1954: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayorhatuhetumadbhāve tādātmye vā pratibandhe satyeva sādhyābhāvaprayuktaḥ sādhanābhāvo bhavet |
SA19n1289:1955: anyatra tu saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatve hetordoṣo'parihārya eveti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1957: idaṃ tu vācaspatimiśrāṇāṃ vacanam 'tasmāt prāmāṇikalokayātrāmanupālayatā yathādarśanaṃ śaṅkanīyam |
SA19n1289:1961: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnato'nviṣyanto'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ' iti |
SA19n1289:1963: ayamāśayaḥ--nanu sādhyasādhanayostādātmyena tadutpattyā vā saṃbandhena bhāvyam,
SA19n1289:1965: sādhanaṃ tu syāditi sādhyasaṃśayasamudbhavādaprayojakaśaṅkā samavataredeveti cenna |
SA19n1289:1966: vahnidhūmayoḥ sāhacarye bhūyassvadhikaraṇeṣu bhūyodṛṣṭe dhūmasya vahninā saha saṃbandhe upādhāvanupalabhyamāne parvate dhūmaṃ paśyato na tatra vahneḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt |
SA19n1289:1968: vahnivirahitasya dhūmavataḥ kasyaciddeśasya prāganubhūtasya smaraṇe satyeva bhavet |

SA19n1289:1995: tena sarvajñena bhāvyamiti ko'yaṃ niyama iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:1997: tṛṇatarulatābhūbhūdharādīnāṃ sarveṣāmeva kartācedekaḥ syāt tadā tena sarvajñena bhāvyam,
SA19n1289:1999: tattadupādānādyabhijñaistaistairbahubhiḥ saṃbhūya sarvamidaṃ kṛtamityapi vaktuṃ śakyeta hīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2015: sādhyena saha hetoḥ pratibandhaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ kaścidapekṣyate sa ca tādātmyaṃ tadurpattirvā |
SA19n1289:2016: svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti tu na pramāṇasiddham |
SA19n1289:2017: ataḥ kāryatvena karturanumānaṃ nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ |

SA19n1289:2034: vyākhyātaṃ caitaddharmottarācāryeṇa--'nanu ca sādharmyavati vyatireko noktaḥ |
SA19n1289:2042: teṣāṃ bahirvyāptipakṣo'bhimata iti vyāptigrahaṇāya pakṣādanyasyāśrayaṇād bahirvyāptipakṣa ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:2045: yat sattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭa iti bhavati sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaprayoga iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2049: tatra śiṃśapātvasya vṛkṣavyavahārayogyatve sādhye dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītavyeti |
SA19n1289:2050: sādharmyadṛṣṭānte pratyakṣeṇānvayāvagamāt vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte'nupalambhena vyatirekāvagamācca pratyakṣeṇānupalbhena ca vyāptyavagama ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:2051: yadvṛkṣavyavahārayogyatvaṃ yacca śiṃśupātvaṃ tadubhayamapi vṛkṣasya svabhāvaviśeṣa iti śiṃśupāntareṣu sādharmyadṛṣṭānteṣu pratyakṣeṇa tayoranvayāvadhāranāt |
SA19n1289:2052: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānteṣu vṛkṣādanyeṣu tayorvyatirekasyānupalanbhenāvadhāraṇāt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptyavadhāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2056: yadi kṣāṇikatā na syāt tarhi sattvaṃ na syāt |
SA19n1289:2060: ghaṭādiṣu ca bhāveṣu arthakriyāsamartheṣu kṣaṇikatvameveti prasaṅgaviparyayo dṛṣṭaḥ |
SA19n1289:2064: na bhavanti sthirā bhāvā nissattvāste tato matāḥ |'
SA19n1289:2066: vyākhyātaṃ ca kamalaśīlena--'kathaṃ punasya hetorvyāptiḥ siddhetyāha--kṣaṇikatvaviyogetvidyādi |
SA19n1289:2068: sthiratayā'bhimateṣu bhāveṣvarthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ nopapadyata ityetat 'tathāhī'tyādinā'sā ca sthireṣu bhāveṣu na ghaṭete'tyantena granthena vistaraśa upapāditam (tattvasaṃ. pañci. 144)
SA19n1289:2070: sarveṣāmeva ghaṭādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ sattvena kṣaṇikatve sādhye sādhyaviparyaye sthiratve yad bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ tena vipakṣe parābhimate vyomādau vastutvāvastutvābhyaṃ vikalpyamāne sati vyāptiravadhāryata ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:2071: ayamāśayaḥ--sarvaṣāmeva bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatve sādhye sapakṣāsaṃbhavena yanna kṣaṇikaṃ tanna sat yathā parābhimataṃ vyomādīti vyatirekavyāptiravadhāryā |
SA19n1289:2072: nanu satā kṣaṇikena bhāvyamiti ko'yaṃ niyamaḥ ? |
SA19n1289:2073: ghaṭādayaḥ santo'pyakṣaṇikā eva kiṃ na syuriti tu nāśaṅkanīyam |
SA19n1289:2080: nanu vyomādisthirabhāvamanaṅgīkurvatāṃ mate vyomādervipakṣasyāprasiddhervipakṣe dharmiṇīti kathamucyate |
SA19n1289:2082: atāpi nāsaṅgatiḥ na hyatra vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntenāvaśyaṃ vastubhūtena bhāvyam |
SA19n1289:2087: pratyakṣaṃ cānupalambhaśca tayoḥ samāhāraḥ pratyakṣānupalambhaṃ tena |
SA19n1289:2101: yadā na vahnistadā na dhūma' iti kālata upalambhānupalambhābhyāṃ traividhyamuktam |
SA19n1289:2102: atha 'yatra dhūmastatra vahniryatra na vahnistatra na dhūmaḥ' iti deśata upalambhānupalambhābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ militāste trayaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇe kāraṇamiti bhavati kāraṇapañcakamityabhipretyāha--pañcavidhapratyakṣamupalambhato veti |
SA19n1289:2107: sādhyasya sapakṣeṃiścayāt vipakṣe sādhanābhāvasya sato'pi sādhyābhāvaprayuktatvāniścayāt jīvaccharīre sātmakatvasādhanāya paraiḥ prayujyamānaḥ saprāṇatvaheturasādhāraṇa iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2114: yadanekagataṃ tadanekam anekavṛtti ca sāmānyam yat sat tat kṣaṇikam sacca vyometi vadadbhirasmābhiḥ sāmānyaṃ vyoma vā'bhyupagamya tatra darmaviśeṣasya sādhanāya neha vyāptiḥ pramāṇīkriyate,
SA19n1289:2115: tayoranabhyupagamāditi cet kimartho'yaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvopanyāsa iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2118: tasmāt anekagataṃ sāmānyamiṣyatā sāmānyamanekameveṣṭavyam ekaṃtaditi vadatā'nekagatamityetadvā parityājyam,
SA19n1289:2119: iti paraṃ pratyaniṣṭe āpādayitavye'nekagatatvānekatvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāve aniṣṭāpādakāṃśe'nekānugataikasāmānyavādinaṃ prati pradarśite ekatvaṃ vā parityājyaṃ,
SA19n1289:2121: yathā katipayavahnidhūmavyaktīnāṃ katipayasthāneṣu yathā mahānasa ityekāṃśabodhane sakalavahnidhūmayoravinābhāva upapādyaḥ smārito bhavati tatheti |
SA19n1289:2123: vādineti | vijigīṣukathāyāṃ vādinā svapakṣasthāpanāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ,
SA19n1289:2126: tadavabodhanāyāyamupakrama iti hetvābhāsanirūpaṇe saṅgatiḥ pradarśitā bhavati |
SA19n1289:2130: siddhasya sādhane siddhasādhanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānāntaramiti pare |
SA19n1289:2134: sādhyaṃcenniścitaṃ sandigdhasādhyakatvābhāvena pakṣasattvasya rūpasyāsaṃbhavāt hetulakṣaṇaṃ nāstītyasiddhāveva samāveśānna nigrahasthānāntaramiti |
SA19n1289:2137: samarthe vastuni sāmarthyaṃ nāma na vastusvarūpādbhinnaḥ kaścana dharmaḥ,
SA19n1289:2139: tasminnasati vastveva netyuktaṃ bhavatīti hetorasāmarthye'vastutvameva tasyeti svarūpāsiddhāveva tasyāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2146: pakṣatayo'bhimatatasyā''tmana evāsiddhau taddharmatayā'bhimatasya hetoḥ kva siddhiriti kaimutikanyāyenāsiddhirityuktaṃ bhavati |
SA19n1289:2156: tasmādahamarthena tadanuguṇena dharmiṇā śarīreṇaiva bhāvyamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2160: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ--'yadyayaṃ gauṇaḥ syāt tadā skhaladvṛttirbhavet |
SA19n1289:2161: nahi loke siṃhamāṇavakayormukhyāropitayordvayorapi siṃha ityaskhalitā buddhirbhavati |

SA19n1289:2164: tatrāpi hi madīya ātmeti vyatireko dṛśyate |

SA19n1289:2174: ātmana evāsiddheḥ kaḥ svabhāvaliṅgasya prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2176: jīvaccharīraṃ sātmakaṃ prāṇādimattvāditi yadanumānaṃ pradarśitaṃ tatra sādhyasyātmano'siddhatayā na tena hetorvyāptirniścīyeteti na tadanumānamātmasādhanāya prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2178: asmadabhyupagatā kṣaṇikavijñānadhīreva bhavatā''tmeti śabdāntareṇa vyavahriyata iti nātra no vipratipattiriti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2180: sopādhikatvena vyāpyatvāsiddhiriti pararasiddhāvantarbhāvyamānā yā vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ sā kuto nokteti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2186: tāsāṃ ca tattadvyaktīnāṃ deśakālabhedena paricchedena paricchinnatayā tattadvayaktīnāmeva sāhacaryagrahāt sāmānyānavalambhinī vyāptirnaiva siddhayet |
SA19n1289:2189: upādhiparijñānapūrvakaṃ vā'nyathā vā sādhane sādhyavyāptyuparodhagrahe syādevānaikāntikateti vyabhicāronnāyakatāmātreṇa na doṣāntarateti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2190: nanu sāmānyamanabhupagacchatāṃ sāmānyamukhenaiva vyāptigraha ityetat kathaṃ syāditi śaṅkate--nānvatyādinā |
SA19n1289:2193: anekānugataṃ tvabhyupagamyate tvayā'pītyāśaṅkāṃ pariharannāha--nanu ko'yamapoho nāmetyādinā |
SA19n1289:2204: anyasmāt mahiṣāderanyad vijātīyaṃ śābaleyādi apohyate vyāvartyate iti seyaṃ vyāvṛttirapohaḥ |
SA19n1289:2218: śābaleyabāhuleyādīn viśeṣān paśyataḥ svalakṣaṇairata eva mitho bhinnairapi tairyathāpratibhāsamarthapratibhāsātmā buddhāvākāra udbhavati |
SA19n1289:2242: na tu nivṛttaḥ sa hi paryudāsa iti yāvat |
SA19n1289:2244: prasajyapratiṣedharūpāpohapakṣe gauriti pratītau kevalo vidhiḥ svalakṣaṇātmā viṣayo bhavatītyāgataṃ na tvapoha ityāśayenāśaṅkate--nanvityādinā |
SA19n1289:2256: nanu śābde vyavahāre gaurityeva śabda uccāryate,

SA19n1289:2268: ataeva bhavati gāṃ purataḥ sthitāṃ paśyataḥ sapadi nāyamaśva ityadhyavasāya iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2272: anyat sarvameva jñānamanumānaṃ vā śābdaṃ vā bhavati vakalpātmakameva |
SA19n1289:2277: tasmāt gāmānayeti śabdaṃ śṛṇvataḥ puruṣasya sapadi bhavatyapoḍhādhyavasāyaḥ,
SA19n1289:2279: ataḥ śabdānāmapoḍhe saṅketa iti susthitamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2300: ya eva hi śabde jñāne pratibhāsate sa eva śabdārtho yuktaḥ,
SA19n1289:2304: tena tadevārthapratibimbakaṃ śābde jñāne sākṣāt tadātmatayā pratibhāsanācchābdo'rtho yukto nānya iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2305: yaścāpi śabdasyārthena saha vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nāsau kāryakāraṇabhāvādanyo'tratiṣṭhate;
SA19n1289:2307: tat adhyavasitabahirbhāvalakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya tattathoktam,
SA19n1289:2308: tadrūpaṃ ca tat pratibimbaṃ ceti samāsaḥ |
SA19n1289:2309: tasya tadrūpapratibambasya dhiyaḥ saṃbandhinaḥ śabdāt janmanyutpāde sati sa vācyavācakalakṣaṇo nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvātmaka eva jātaḥ |
SA19n1289:2314: idaṃ ca śabdaprāmāṇyamanabhyupagacchataḥ svasamayaniṣṭhān prati pratipādyate |
SA19n1289:2316: tadā tasminnarthe śabdasya prāmāṇyāpātena śabdapramāṇato'vagatasyārthasya sattvaviniścayāt ' ayaṃ gaurastī' ti astipadaprayogo vyarthaḥ,
SA19n1289:2319: śabdaśravaṇasamantaraṃ yathāsaṅketaṃ samupajātāduktalakṣaṇādhyavasāyādbhavati bāhyārthāvabodhaḥ tasya sattā tu nāvagamyate,
SA19n1289:2329: tathā ca svalakṣāṇasya tadarthasya sattā tenaivāvadhṛteti na tadavabodhanāya astītipadāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2332: yā vyaktiryenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tanniṣṭhā jātirapi tenaivendriyeṇa gṛhyata ityeṣa pareṣāṃ svagoṣṭhīniṣṭhaḥ samayaḥ kevalam,
SA19n1289:2334: tat sāmānye na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2336: athāpi gamekāṃ purataḥ paśyato'nubhūtānekagovyakteḥ puṃso bhavati kaścidekākāraparāmarśalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayaḥ,
SA19n1289:2338: anyathā tadanupapattestadeva ca sāmānyamityāśayena pareṇa kriyamānāmāśaṅkāmanūdya nirasyati--naceti |
SA19n1289:2340: gavādivyaktayaḥ svahetubhyo jāyamānāṃ śaktiviśeṣaviśiṣṭā eva jāyante,
SA19n1289:2341: yayā mitho bhinnā api gośabdābhilapyāḥ kāścideva vyaktayo gaurityekākāraparāmarśe hetavo bhavanti,
SA19n1289:2346: indriyatvāviśeṣe'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnāṃ rupagrahaṇasāmarthyaṃ kāsāñcideva rasagranaḥasāmarthyamiti yathā niyataṃ tathetyarthaḥ |
SA19n1289:2350: tāsāmeṣa svabhāvaviśeṣo yadekākārapratyavamarśahetutvamiti svabhāvāśrayaṇetottaraṃ pramāṇikavastvapalāpāyaivetyāśaṅkāṃ parihannāha-- kiñceti |
SA19n1289:2351: ayamāśayaḥ--dravyādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ bhinnaṃ sāmānyamatiriktaḥ padārthaṃ iti vadatāṃ mate jātivyaktyoratyantabhedo bhavatyabhimataḥ,
SA19n1289:2353: evaṃ bhedāviśeṣe'pi gotvaṃ govyaktiṣveva samavaiti nānyatra,
SA19n1289:2354: aśvatvamaśvavyaktiṣveva samavaiti nānyatretyatra kiṃ niyāmakamiti śaṅkāyāṃ svabhāva evaiṣa gotvādīnāṃ,
SA19n1289:2357: asmābhiḥ pratipādyamānaṃ svabhāvāśraṇenottaraṃ prāmāṇikaṃ paraiḥ pratipādyamānaṃ tvaprāmāṇikamityeṣa viśeṣa iti |
SA19n1289:2362: viśeṣyāt bhinnaṃ yadviśeṣaṇam--viśiṣṭabuddhau viśeṣyatayā bhāsamānasya yadviśeṣaṇatayā bhāsate viśeṣyato bhinnaṃ,
SA19n1289:2366: gauriti yadvastupratyakṣaṃ tat piṇḍaṃ tato bhinnaṃ gotvaṃ sāmānyaṃ cobhayamavabhāsayatītyetat sarvānubhavaviruddham,
SA19n1289:2367: puraḥsthitaṃ paśyato hi sphurati vastumātramiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2374: gotve sāmānyatvamiti ca na gotvato bhinnaṃ,
SA19n1289:2378: ayaṃ gauriti pratyakṣe vastuto vastumātragrāhiṇyapi svarūpavān ghaṭa ityatra kalpitabhedamādāya viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvopapattivat piṇḍādananyatve'pi gotvasya kalpitabhedamādāya viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvopapattyā arthāntaraprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2381: evaṃ sāmānyasādhakatayā parābhimataṃ prayogaṃ nirasya sāmānyanirāsakaṃ prayogaṃ pradarśayati--sāmānyasya niṣedhāyetyādinā--yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate iti |
SA19n1289:2385: satyapīndriyasaṃprayogādāvupalambhakasamavāye upalabhyamāne ca vyaktiviśeṣe tatra gotvaṃ vipratipannaṃ naivopalabhyate,
SA19n1289:2387: na tato'nyā gotvajātirupalabhyate iti nāsiddho heturiti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2388: nanu darśanāgocarasyāpi jñānasyeva cākṣuṣopalambhāgocarasyāpi sāmānyasya nāsadbhāva ityāśaṅkāmanūdya pariharati--nāpītyādinā |

SA19n1289:2588: yāvadbādhakaṃ nopalabhyate tāvat tatra saṃśayastu syādeva,
SA19n1289:2589: evaṃ sati kathaṃ bhavān sugatasārvajñyaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ prabhavati |
SA19n1289:2590: nanu bādhakaṃ pradarśitam--'sarvajñatā ca na ghaṭate' ityādinā |
SA19n1289:2593: na śrotrādi śrotraṃ śabdameva gṛhṇīyānna rūpam,
SA19n1289:2599: nanu mano nāmāntaramindriyaṃ bāhyendriya dvāreṇaivārthe pravartetetyanullaṅghanīyo niyamaḥ |
SA19n1289:2608: yathā yathā nairātmyabhāvanayā'pacīyante rāgādayo malāstathā tathā caturāryabhavanayā ca prakarṣaṃ gatayā pravardhate prajñā,
SA19n1289:2614: sādaranirantarābhyāsāt prajñāprakarṣo bhatītyatra tu bhavatyayaṃ prayogaḥ--'yo yaḥ sādare' tyādi riti |
SA19n1289:2619: so'yaṃ kāmicittaguṇabhūto yuvatyākāraḥ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitaḥ sphuṭībhāvayogyo bhavati (sphuṭāvabhāso bhavati)

SA19n1289:2624: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandha iti tadetat skandhapañcakaṃ duḥkha mucyate |
SA19n1289:2627: nirodhasyāsya yat dvāraṃ sa mārga ucyate |
SA19n1289:2630: te hi saṅkalpapathamārūḍhā duḥkhādyāryacatuṣṭayākārāḥ pratyātmaṃ cetastale prakāśanta eveti nāśrayāsiddhiḥ |
SA19n1289:2633: cittasyālambanākāratayā ālambanamātraṃ cittākāra eveti te cetoguṇāḥ pratyātmaṃ prakāśanta eveti na hetvasiddhiḥ |

SA19n1289:2640: sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsaviśiṣṭā ye ye cetoguṇā yuvatyākārādayaste sarve'pi sphūṭāvabhāsayogyā eva na tu sarva te sphuṭāvabhāsāyogyāḥ |

SA19n1289:2650: itthaṃ ca sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ siddhyantīti kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇāt pratibandhādhvayāptisiddhiriti bhāvaḥ |

SA19n1289:2682: tathā sugatānuyāyināṃ 'kṣāṇikaḥ sarva eva saṃskārā' ityasmin vacane ca |

SA19n1289:2688: pramāṇaniścitārthakatvasya hetuviśeṣaṇasya prayojanaṃ prakāśayannanaikāntikatāṃ vārayati--vacanamātrasya saṃśayapiparyāsapūrvakatve'pīti |
SA19n1289:2695: asati kāraṇe kāryānupalambha iti pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇavyorvyāptirnirābādhā gṛhyata eveti bhāvaḥ,

SA19n1289:2705: ye nāma bodhisattvāḥ syuḥ prakṛtyaiva kṛpāmayāḥ |
SA19n1289:2713: kiṃ śabdaḥ pratikṣepe--pramāṇa nāstītyarthaḥ lokāyata tānuyāyinaḥ seyamāśaṅkā |

SA19n1289:2728: arhatāmapagatarāgādīnāṃ caramaṃ cittaṃ cittāntaraṃ notpādayatīti saugaterapīṣyata iti tasmiṃścitte vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ |

SA19n1289:2752: x x x x parasiddhāntāśrayaṇenāpi kāṃścid bauddhān prati sādhyadharmasamanvito na siddho dṛṣṭānta iti darśayannāha--yeceha sudhiya itī'ti (tattvasaṃ. pañci. 538-539)

SA19n1289:2766: sarvajñāśca bahavo buddhāḥ ityādibhedavarṇanaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭate,

SA19n1289:2795: nīlādayo bāhyārthaḥ svākāraṃ buddhau samarpya svayaṃ najyanti,
SA19n1289:2800: tarhi prakāśasvabhāvatayā tadapi cittavadābhyantarameveti kathaṃ tad bāhyamucyate |
SA19n1289:2802: cakṣuḥpathe yannipatitaṃ tasya ca cittasya ca kaḥ saṃbandhaḥ yaccittena gṛhyeta,
SA19n1289:2806: na cet saṃvedyate--yadā ca na saṃvedyate,

SA19n1289:2821: atha yogācāramataṃ vijñānamātrāstitvapakṣaṃ nirūpayan bāhyastitvavādaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--kaḥ punarasāṃ bāhyo'rthaṃ iti |

SA19n1289:2843: anenāhaṃgrahahetubhūtasyāhamarthasya kādācitkatvasiddhyā ātmā nityo'stītyetannirastaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2850: saudāminī kṣaṇamāvirbhūya tiṃrobhavati tāmanu tadjñānamapīti pratyakṣam |
SA19n1289:2851: saudāminyāḥ prāk paścācca na tajjñānopalambha ityanupalambhaḥ |
SA19n1289:2857: nanu akādacitkādapi syāt kādācitkādapīti cet tarhi aniyatakāraṇatāpatteṃrahetukataivāpataditi bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2859: saudāminyāṃ tadjñāne ca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sādhyahetvoḥ sāhacaryaniyame satyapyanyatrānaikāntikataivetyāśayaḥ |
SA19n1289:2862: anyatra vinaiva vahniṃ dhūmaḥ kiṃ na svādityanaikāntikatāśaṅkā tatrāpi prasajediti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2867: kāraṇasya kuvadrapatvāt--kāryaniṣpādanasāmarthyena kāraṇaṃ kāryarupaṃ kurvadeva syāt,
SA19n1289:2872: tayorbhedaniyamāt abhede tu svabhāvaikyena kurvato'pyakurvato'pi syādeva kāryotpattiritiṃ bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2874: akādācitkasyaivātmanaḥ kādācitkāhaṃgrahotpādakatve ekena tena kramādyāvanto'haṃgrahā utpādyante te sarve yugapadutpadyeran |
SA19n1289:2884: vastu vā tadavastu veti vicārayanto vayamavastveveti brūmaḥ--vastunā hyarthakriyāsamarthena bhāvyam,
SA19n1289:2890: atha teṣu sapratigheṣvasatsu teṣāmabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ siddha iti kimākāśena,
SA19n1289:2897: nityamekaṃ vibhumākāśamicchatāṃ śabdasya tadāśrayatāṃ ca svīkurvatāṃ jāyamānasya sarvasya śabdasyākāśa eva deśa iti asya śabdasyāyaṃ deśaḥ tasya tu sa deśa iti deśavibhāgasya vaktumaśakyatayā deśavibhāgena śabdaśravaṇaṃ nopapadyeta,
SA19n1289:2898: yaḥ śrotrākāśa ucyate sa cākāśānnatiricyate iti nāyaṃ śrotrākāśasya saṃnihitaḥ śabdaḥ ayameva tu sannihita ityāśrayākāśe pradeśabhedakalpanasyānupapannatvāt sarva eva śabdāḥ śrūyeran,
SA19n1289:2900: tarhi tadanyaḥ sannihitoṃ ya ucyate so'pi na śrūyeta,
SA19n1289:2902: yadi śrūyeran sarvaṃ eva śrūyeran na cennaikopīti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2904: uktaṃ ca kamalaśīlena --'yadi hi nityaikanabhodravyasamavetā amī syuḥ,
SA19n1289:2905: tadā sakṛdutpannānekaśabdavat atatkālā api śabdā abhimatakāla eva syuḥ |
SA19n1289:2916: yā tu manaḥsādhane parairyuktirnirūpitā tāmanudya nirasyati--yugapadjñānānutpattyetyādinā |
SA19n1289:2917: ayamāśayaḥ -- yadi mano neṣyeta jñānāṃ cākṣuṣādīnāṃ yaugapadyamāpadyeta |
SA19n1289:2918: ātmano vibhoścakṣurādīndriyaiḥ saha sadaiva saṃbhavāt karatalasannihitasya kusumādeścakṣuḥspārśanādīndriyasaṃprayogasya yugapat saṃbhavāt |
SA19n1289:2919: manasi cendriye'bhyupagamyamāne'ṇostasya yugapadanekendriyasaṃyogasyāsaṃbhavād indriyamanaḥsaṃyogasyāpi pratyakṣe hetutayā na jñānānāṃ yaugapadyaprasaṅga iti vaiśeṣikā manyante |
SA19n1289:2921: nartakīṃ paśyanto hi tasyā rūpaṃ gānaṃ ca yugapadeva sākṣātkurvantaḥ kamapyahlādamanubhavanti,
SA19n1289:2923: lokānubhavasiddhasya jñānayaugapadyasya vyāvatireva syāttannāstyeva parābhimataṃ manaḥ,
SA19n1289:2929: kāraṇasya tu nityatve kārye kramikatā katham |
SA19n1289:2943: yadi syādupalabhyeta nopalabhyatetu paṭo nāma kaścittaṃttubhyonyaḥ,
SA19n1289:2946: atrāyaṃ prayogaḥ--yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sadyatra nopalabhyate na tattatrāsti,
SA19n1289:2961: bhāgā eva hi bhāsanta ityetat praśnaprativacanamukhena vyācaṣṭe nanu ko'yamityadinā |
SA19n1289:2964: nānādigdeśāvaṣṭambhena bahavaḥ paramāṇavaḥ ekasmin sthale pūrvapaścimadakṣiṇottarordhvādholakṣaṇanānādigdeśāvaṣṭambhena sthitāḥ puṃjībhūtā ucyante
SA19n1289:2984: avayavisamarthanāya pravṛttaṃ prati prativaktavye sayūthyānāṃ matenedamucyate iti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:2986: atha bāhyārthānnirasyannāha--te'pi yogācārāṇāṃ mate na santīti |
SA19n1289:2992: ataeva puñjāvasthāyāṃ dṛśyamānānāṃ pratyekamavasthitau kuto'dṛśyateti śaṅkāyā nāvakāśaḥ |
SA19n1289:2998: atredaṃ vimṛśyate--samuditā eva jāyantāṃ samuditā eva naśyantu,
SA19n1289:3003: ucyate--yo hi paramāṇuḥ paramāṇumadhyamadhyāste sa caturṣu pārśveṣu adharottaraṃ ca paramāṇubhiḥ sasṛṣṭa iti digbhāgabhedena ṣaḍaṃśatāpattyā naikatāpattiranatilaṅghanīyaiva |
SA19n1289:3004: sa hi madhyagataḥ paramāṇuḥ pārśve paramāṇau yena svabhāvena saṃsṛjate,
SA19n1289:3006: yena svabhāvena ūrdhādhaḥparamaṇubhyāṃ saṃyujyate na tena pārśvaparamāṇau |
SA19n1289:3008: digbhedakṛtabhedasya durnirūpatayā ekadeśatāpatteḥ pracayo na siddhayet |
SA19n1289:3015: ato naika ityeva brūmaḥ na paramāṇurathāpyaneka iti tryāha tam |
SA19n1289:3016: kasmāt ?, paramāṇoḥ--paramāṇutayā'bhimatasyānaiḥ saha paramāṇubhiḥ paramāṇuśaḥ--atyantāṇuśaḥ sayogasyāsaṃbhavāt |
SA19n1289:3020: atha cenniraṃśaḥ saṃyujyate ityutyucyeta sarvataḥ saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśatayā piṇḍaḥ paramāṇūmātra eva syāt |
SA19n1289:3043: daurghaṭyaṃ ca nirūpitamityāśayenāha -- yadi bāhyo'rtha ityādinā |
SA19n1289:3048: bhavati cātra prayoga ityāśayenāha -- na ca svāpnajāgradanubhavayorityādinā anālambanādanavāptarūpaviśeṣamiti |
SA19n1289:3051: cākṣuṣadoṣavaśāt dṛśyate nabhasi keśa iva bhraman,
SA19n1289:3060: nanu--asati bāhye'rthe kiṃ tarhi sat bhavataḥ,
SA19n1289:3075: saṃvṛttyaiva pravṛtto natu viṣayitayā vastutastena śūnyam |
SA19n1289:3078: vijānānamātravādiṣu kecana vijñānameva vāsanāvaicitryeṇa nīlapītādivividhākāraṃ bhūtvā bhāsate iti,
SA19n1289:3079: apare tu vastuto nirākārameva tu tat,
SA19n1289:3082: pakṣadvaye'pyasmin grāhyagrāhakabhāvarāhityaṃ vijñānasya saṃpratipannameveti vijñānasvabhāvaparyālocanayā bāhyārthagrāhakatā vijñānasyetyetaddarotsāritamityāha--tatra kecidityādinā |
SA19n1289:3084: na cāsya vicārataḥ kaścit svabhāvo ghaṭate eko vā'neko veti |
SA19n1289:3085: vijñānamātravādīnā paramāṇau bāhyatayā parairabhimate kimayamekasvabhāvaḥ--uta naikasvabhāvaḥ (ekarūpa uta naikarūpaḥ)
SA19n1289:3092: bhāvā yena nirūpyante iti bhāvāḥ--bāhyā ābhyantaraśca |
SA19n1289:3097: atha pramāṇameva yadā vicāryamāṇaṃ viśīryate tadadhīnasadgāvasya sarvaṃsyānyasya kva vastutā,
SA19n1289:3100: nanu ayaṃ baddho'yaṃ mukta iti vyavasthā'pi vyāhanyeta |
SA19n1289:3102: iyaṃ vyavasthā'pi saṃvṛttyaiva na paramārthata iti |
SA19n1289:3110: svabhāvarāhityādbhāvānāmapāramārthye prayogaṃ pradarśayati--prayogaḥ punarevamiti ekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavatīti |
SA19n1289:3116: hetoḥ pakṣe sattvamupapādayannasiddhiśaṅkāṃ vārayati--na tāvada siddho hetuṃriti |
SA19n1289:3117: sākāre vijñāne bahirartha eva ekānekasvabhāvāyogyatvasya parispuṭatvāditi |
SA19n1289:3118: nīlapītādāvaṇusamudāye bāhyārthatayā iṣyamāṇe aṇurayamekasvabhāvo vā naikasvabhāvo vā ubhayathā'pi nopapadyata iti yo doṣa udbhāvitaḥ,
SA19n1289:3120: nīlapītadyākāraṃ sadvabhāsate iti vadato'pi samāna eveti sphuṭameveti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:3122: idaṃ nīlamidaṃ pītamiti idantayā loke vyavahriyamāṇo nīlapītādiraṇusamudāyo bāhyo'rtha iti sarvāstitvavādinā iṣyate,
SA19n1289:3123: vijñānavādinā tu vijñānameva ttattadākāraṃ bahirvadavabhāsata iti vadatā vijñānākāratayā nīlapītādyabhyugataṃ bhavatīti nīlapitādi tu na sarvathā'pohyate,
SA19n1289:3125: tathāca bāhyatve ya ākṣepaḥ sa āntaratve'pi samāna eveti bhāvaḥ |
SA19n1289:3129: tathāca bāhyaṃ vā bhavatu āntaraṃ vā,
SA19n1289:3131: nanu bāhyaṃ nīlapītādyabhyupagacchatā mūrtaṃ taditi svīkṛtaṃ bhavati,
SA19n1289:3132: vijñānamātraṃ taditi vadatāṃ tu tadamūrtaṃ bhavatīti neyaṃ śaṅkā'mūte prasaredityāśaṅkā paraharannāha--mūrtanimittamityādinā |
SA19n1289:3134: sākāratve mūrtatā katha mityatrāha--ayameva hi cittānāmākāro mūrtiriti |
SA19n1289:3136: nirākārajñānamātrapāramārthyavāde tu prakārāntareṇa bhāvamātrasādhāraṇo doṣo vistaraśo nirūpito'nyatra--
SA19n1289:3137: 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
SA19n1289:3138: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana |
